column1: Friends may call at the Liley Funeral Home in Marble Hill
column4: 2015 from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM. Funeral Services will be Thursday
column6: 2015 at 1:00 PM at the Funeral Home with Rev. Jimmie Fulbright
column9: and Rev. Kevin Mills officiating. Burial will follow in the Pulliam Cemetery near Patton.
